publisher.publisher-name: Military Operations Research Society in cooperation with the Military Applications Society (MAS) of the Institute for Operations Research and Management Science (INFORMS)

bio.p: Dr. Simon R. Goerger is the ERDC Director of the Institute for Systems Engineering Research (ISER) at the Information Technology Laboratory (ITL) of the US Army Engineer Research and Development Center (ERDC) in Vicksburg, Mississippi. He was awarded his bachelor of science from the United States Military Academy, his master of science in national security strategy from the National War College, and his master of science in computer science and doctorate of philosophy in modeling and simulations from the Naval Postgraduate School. He is the MORS 2017–2018 Membership committee chair and has served as a member of the MORS Board of Directors for nine of the last 10 years.
